name: Above the Clouds (Streetlamp)
description:
This is my submission for the for the 2021 GMTK Game Jam.  As the player, you are joined to your Parachute, using it to glide above the clouds, but, you can cut the lines that join you to the Parachute in order to avoid obstacles.

apologies for the small tutorial text, to make it easier I wrote it here:

Controls:

Press D to speed up and A to slow down

Press the space bar to cut one of the lines to your parachute, but be careful,  the more lines you cut the faster you will fall

Grab extra parachutes to replenish your lines

Go into updrafts to rise higher and avoid incoming birds
